name: PHProjectTypeDescription
desc: An extensible enumerator for PHProjectType that's presented to users in the project picker.

items.name: init(projectType: PHProjectType, title: String, description: String?, image: NSImage?)
items.desc: A convenience initializer without subtype descriptions.

items.name: init(projectType: PHProjectType, title: String, description: String?, image: NSImage?, subtypeDescriptions: [PHProjectTypeDescription])
items.desc: A designated initializer for project type descriptions with the full subtype hierarchy specified up front and a standard string for description text.

items.name: init(projectType: PHProjectType, title: String, attributedDescription: NSAttributedString?, image: NSImage?, subtypeDescriptions: [PHProjectTypeDescription])
items.desc: A designated initializer for project type descriptions with the full subtype hierarchy specified up front and an attributed string for description text.

items.name: init(projectType: PHProjectType, title: String, description: String?, image: NSImage?, canProvideSubtypes: Bool)
items.desc: A designated initializer for project type descriptions with lazily fetched subtypes and a standard description string.

items.name: init(projectType: PHProjectType, title: String, attributedDescription: NSAttributedString?, image: NSImage?, canProvideSubtypes: Bool)
items.desc: A designated initializer for project type descriptions with lazily fetched subtypes and an attributed description string.

items.name: var projectType: PHProjectType
items.desc: An identifier for the project type.

items.name: var localizedTitle: String
items.desc: The localized title of the project type as shown to the user.

items.name: var localizedDescription: String?
items.desc: The localized description of the project type as shown to the user.

items.name: var localizedAttributedDescription: NSAttributedString?
items.desc: The localized attributed description of the project type as shown to the user.

items.name: var image: NSImage?
items.desc: An optional image associated with the project type in the picker.

items.name: var subtypeDescriptions: [PHProjectTypeDescription]
items.desc: An array of type descriptions used for subtype descriptions.

items.name: var canProvideSubtypes: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean variable indicating whether subtypes can be fetched from the data source.
